actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove the restriction on the use of certain private institutions under the dependents' medical care program.

summary.text: Removes the restriction on the use by dependents of Armed Forces personnel private institutions under the dependents' medical care program. States that such private institutions need not be non-profit. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1079(d)(4))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove the restriction on the use of certain private institutions under the dependents' medical care program.
